Quiz.question: 1 Part III: Interpreting the Findings Select the correct answer, then click Done. To determine the level of exposure to the SeaBee personnel, you're considering a requirement for all personnel deployed to the site to submit bioassay samples for analysis. What is your next step to collect these samples? Collect nasal swabs only, because Cesium is airborne Contact the USAFSAM ESOH Service Center to determine which samples should be collected Collect fecal, urine, and lung samples for analysis from CHPPM Coordinate with Public Health for collection of all samples 2
